import React from 'react' import {Card, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; /* trovati online */ const SingleCard = ({asin, title, author, category, price, img}) => { return (
{/* non riesco a modificare altezza, la voglio fissa */} {title} {author} {category.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + category.slice(1)} â‚¬{price}
) } export default SingleCard
